about_the_game:
A dark-fantasy round-based demonic First-person shooter. A long-forgotten order known only as the Blood Reavers have waged a war for thousands of years, preventing the forces of hell from breaching into the world of the living. You play as one of four unlikely heroes, who, after harnessing the powers of blood magic, reignite an ancient conflict between the forces of good and evil. Now they must rediscover the history of the order, and end this demonic invasion.


DISCLAIMER:

All footage & screenshots are from pre-alpha gameplay and subject to change

Experience everything you love about the round-shooter genre, including classic mechanics, a gameplay-first philosophy, and in-wave progression. Blood Reaver expands the genre with all-new mechanics including a revamped combat system, blood magic abilities, exfiltration mechanics, relic crafting, and long-term progression!

Hunt for secrets and easter eggs to uncover the dark, rich lore behind the world of Blood Reaver, exploring mysteries deep beyond the gates of hell… and perhaps ever deeper.

  • Harvest your enemies: Use lethal weapons to harvest the blood of demons, fuel your abilities and unleash the full power of a Blood Reaver.

  • Create devastating synergies: Execute demons with the finest of what Bartov’s arsenal has to offer, massacring hordes with a variety of weapons and abilities.

  • Master forgotten magic: Get up close and personal with the ancient spells of the Blood Reaver Knights, or tap into the mysteries of the forgotten Shadowmancy, bending your soul to fight back against the invasion.

Survive waves and complete objectives to gain Soul Shards and Grymstone. Exfiltrate with ancient relics and use these materials to craft them giving you temporary power boosts and upgrades. Harness the power of Soul Shards upgrading your abilities and potentially morphing them to create formidable variations. Gain these newly upgraded abilities and relics in-game to create a masterful arsenal and survive the swarm.

Slaughter endless demons in a series of locations, following our champions as you discover the secrets to stopping the demonic invasion. Each map features unique mechanics and challenges, 3 unlockable blood magic abilities, legendary weapons, and special enemy types.

  • The Beginning of the End
    An ancient sanctum rediscovered by those who delved too deep, where demons from hell have been unleashed.

  • 6 Blood Magic Abilities

  • 6 Lethal Weapons

  • 2 Enemy types

  • 4 Demonic pacts

  • 7 Holy Blessings

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 / GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080Ti / RTX 3060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 6600XT or Intel® Arc™ A770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: A dark-fantasy round-based demonic FPS. Become the Blood Reaver. Harness forbidden magic and weaponry to shoot, blast and slice your way through endless hordes of demons. Upgrade your gear and survive long enough to discover the ancient secrets of the gods of hell.
